Posts.Content: lemonnutz wrote: Ummm... I am just wanna to get information about breast cancer because my mum was the "lucky one" who get it. Is like in a package or not necessary to take it after lumpectomy or we just need to take maybe depend on the person? Sorry for this all question, but I am the first time to face this.
